name: Space Ball (itch) (Reazy)
description:
This is a simple casual game in which you need to play for the ball, in which you need to avoid the platforms.

👉 Control: [Space] [Нажмите] [Left Click] - aim the ball in the opposite direction.

The game can be translated into any language. I will be very happy if you decide to translate this game into your own language.

😀 My Discord Server: https://discord.gg/8VshJwRsaG
